filmography.title: High Voltage
filmography.role_description: A criminal being escorted to prison who gets stranded in a snowstorm with other travelers; Lombard's first all-talking role.
filmography.plot: A busload of stranded travelers, including a prisoner and a detective, take shelter in an abandoned church during a blizzard.

filmography.title: Safety in Numbers
filmography.role_description: One of three Follies girls hired to chaperone a wealthy heir and teach him the ways of the world.
filmography.plot: A rich young man's uncle hires three showgirls to guide his nephew through New York City and keep him out of trouble.

filmography.title: Man of the World
filmography.role_description: An innocent American girl traveling in Paris who falls in love with a cynical novelist/blackmailer played by William Powell.
filmography.plot: A former novelist running a blackmail racket in Paris falls for the niece of one of his victims.

filmography.title: Ladies' Man
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, married socialite who becomes infatuated with a gigolo, leading to tragic consequences.
filmography.plot: A man who lives off the gifts of wealthy women tries to go straight for the love of a simple girl, but his past interferes.

filmography.title: Virtue
filmography.role_description: A streetwise woman trying to leave her past as a prostitute behind to marry a cab driver, showcasing Lombard's dramatic range.
filmography.plot: A New York cabbie marries a former streetwalker, but his mistrust and her past threaten their happiness.

filmography.title: No Man of Her Own
filmography.role_description: A bored librarian who marries a card shark on a coin toss, unaware of his criminal profession.
filmography.plot: A big-time gambler on the run marries a small-town librarian to lay low, but she eventually reforms him.

filmography.title: Supernatural
filmography.role_description: A gentle heiress who becomes possessed by the spirit of an executed murderess in this rare horror role for Lombard.
filmography.plot: A spiritualist helps the ghost of an executed killer take over the body of an innocent heiress to seek revenge.

filmography.title: The Eagle and the Hawk
filmography.role_description: A mysterious woman who provides a brief respite for a traumatized WWI pilot played by Fredric March.
filmography.plot: Two rival WWI pilots are forced to fly together as a team, dealing with the psychological toll of aerial warfare.

filmography.title: White Woman
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer in Malaysia who marries a tyrannical plantation owner to escape deportation.
filmography.plot: A singer marries a cruel rubber plantation owner to escape the law, finding herself trapped in a remote jungle outpost.

filmography.title: Bolero
filmography.role_description: A dancer who teams up with an egotistical performer, challenging him to put their art before his vanity.
filmography.plot: An ambitious dancer is determined to reach the top, using a series of female partners until he finds the one he loves.

filmography.title: Twentieth Century
filmography.role_description: A shopgirl turned diva actress who engages in a battle of wits with her egomaniacal former director on a cross-country train.
filmography.plot: A theater director tries to win back his former star actress during a train ride on the 20th Century Limited.

filmography.title: Now and Forever
filmography.role_description: The loyal girlfriend of a con man who tries to help him go straight after he takes custody of his young daughter.
filmography.plot: A swindler travels the world with his new wife and young daughter, Shirley Temple, trying to stay ahead of the law.

filmography.title: The Gay Bride
filmography.role_description: A gold-digging showgirl who marries a gangster for his money, only to find herself inheriting his mob problems.
filmography.plot: A chorus girl marries a racketeer for his money, but when he is killed, she has to deal with his rivals.

filmography.title: Lady by Choice
filmography.role_description: A fan dancer who adopts a homeless elderly woman as a publicity stunt but develops a genuine bond with her.
filmography.plot: A novelty dancer decides to adopt a 'mother' for publicity on Mother's Day and picks a gin-soaked street person.
filmography.awards: Sequel to Lady for a Day

filmography.title: Hands Across the Table
filmography.role_description: A manicurist looking to marry a rich husband who accidentally falls for a penniless playboy.
filmography.plot: A manicurist intent on marrying for money falls for a former millionaire who is also looking for a rich spouse.

filmography.title: My Man Godfrey
filmography.role_description: A dizzy, eccentric socialite who hires a 'forgotten man' from a city dump as her family butler and falls in love with him.
filmography.plot: A socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler, but he turns out to be more than he seems and turns the tables on his employers.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination â€“ Best Actress; National Film Registry (Inducted 1999)

filmography.title: The Princess Comes Across
filmography.role_description: An aspiring actress from Brooklyn who poses as a Swedish princess on a luxury liner to get a film contract.
filmography.plot: A Brooklyn girl poses as a princess to get into movies but gets mixed up in a murder mystery on an ocean liner.

filmography.title: Nothing Sacred
filmography.role_description: A small-town woman who fakes a terminal illness to get a free trip to New York, becoming a media sensation.
filmography.plot: A reporter tries to redeem his reputation by covering the story of a woman supposedly dying of radium poisoning, unaware she is healthy.

filmography.title: True Confession
filmography.role_description: A compulsive liar who confesses to a murder she didn't commit to help her lawyer husband win a big case.
filmography.plot: A pathological liar confesses to a murder to boost her husband's legal career, claiming self-defense.

filmography.title: Swing High, Swing Low
filmography.role_description: A woman who falls for a charming trumpet player in Panama, supporting him as he rises to fame and succumbs to alcoholism.
filmography.plot: A shipboard romance between a trumpet player and a woman leads to marriage, but his career ambition drives them apart.

filmography.title: Made for Each Other
filmography.role_description: A young wife who struggles with financial hardships, a meddling mother-in-law, and a sick child in a serious dramatic role.
filmography.plot: A young couple gets married after a whirlwind romance but struggles with domestic trials and a life-threatening emergency.

filmography.title: In Name Only
filmography.role_description: A widow who falls in love with a married man, unaware that his manipulative wife is refusing to grant him a divorce.
filmography.plot: A wealthy man trapped in a loveless marriage falls for a widow, but his wife refuses to let him go.

filmography.title: Vigil in the Night
filmography.role_description: A dedicated nurse who takes the blame for her sister's fatal mistake, sacrificing her career for her family.
filmography.plot: A nurse sacrifices her career to cover for her sister's negligence, which resulted in the death of a patient.

filmography.title: They Knew What They Wanted
filmography.role_description: A waitress who agrees to marry an older vineyard owner by mail, believing he is the handsome man in the photo he sent.
filmography.plot: A waitress agrees to marry a grape grower she has never met, only to discover he is not the handsome man in the photo.

filmography.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
filmography.role_description: A wife who discovers her three-year marriage is not legally valid and decides to torture her husband before remarrying him.
filmography.plot: A couple discovers their marriage isn't legal, leading the wife to kick the husband out and date his partner to make him jealous.

filmography.title: To Be or Not to Be
filmography.role_description: A famous Polish stage actress who becomes involved in a dangerous espionage plot against the Nazis; Lombard's final film.
filmography.plot: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.
filmography.awards: Final Film Released Posthumously; National Film Registry (Inducted 1996)
